mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chechen_maintenance ( carId, date, type, nextDate, cost, mileage, status, remark, createTime ) VALUES ( #{carId}, #{date}, #{type}, #{nextDate}, #{cost}, #{mileage}, #{status}, #{remark}, now() )
mapper.select:
SELECT m.id, m.carId, car.plateNumber, cc.userName, cc.phone, m.date, m.type, m.nextDate, m.cost, m.mileage, m.status, m.remark, m.deFlag, m.createTime, m.creator, m.updateTime, m.updator FROM chechen_maintenance m , chechen_car car left join (select c.userName,c.phone,ccar.carId from chechen_customer_car ccar,chechen_customer c where ccar.deFlag=0 and c.deFlag=0 and ccar.customerId=c.id) cc on car.id=cc.carId WHERE m.deFlag=0 and car.deFlag=0 AND m.carId=car.id
AND car.plateNumber like concat('%',#{plateNumber},'%')
AND m.status=#{status}
ORDER BY m.createTime desc
